name: radio-telemetry-tracker-drone-gcs-electron
description: Radio Telemetry Tracker Drone Ground Control Station Electron App

scripts.build:windows: npm run clean && poetry run pyinstaller --onefile radio_telemetry_tracker_drone_gcs/main.py --name radio_telemetry_tracker_drone_gcs_server --distpath build/backend/windows && tsc -p . && node scripts/copy-assets.js && electron-builder --windows
scripts.build:linux: npm run clean && poetry run pyinstaller --onefile radio_telemetry_tracker_drone_gcs/main.py --name radio_telemetry_tracker_drone_gcs_server --distpath build/backend/linux && tsc -p . && node scripts/copy-assets.js && electron-builder --linux
